name: warDrive: Prologue
description:
You can crack into a lot of crypto when you're born with an RF transmitter in your lymphatic system, but now you're on the lam, riding shotgun with a cybernetic stranger at the wheel of your new ride.



warDrive is a casual rail shooter and idler.
Lock-on then unleash a barrage of cyber attacks. Dismantle enemy drones, pickpocket crypto wallets, and fight your way to freedom. Buy upgrades, passive crypto mining, and progress through the story.
